comment._content:
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hélène_Dutrieu

Helene Dutrieu (1877-1961), Belgian (later French, by marriage) cyclist, automobile racer, stunt driver, aviator, ambulance driver, hospital director.

comment._content: Awesome pix. of this Famous Lady!

comment._content: Interesting photo of a brave Woman.

comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content: Flew in the United States, Nassau Boulevard Aerodrome, Garden City, Long Island , New York  September 23, 1911- October 1, 1911  International Aviation meet. Flew during meet with Harriet Quimby  ( Aero Club of America Pilot # 37 August 1, 1911) and Matilde Moisant ( Aero Club of America Pilot # 44  August 13, 1911)
